content.text: is designed to process cancellations of spanned billing periods for Con Edison utility accounts. It performs several key operations: it processes spanned data into a summary table, ensures billing period revisions are correct, updates records with cancellation information, and inserts cancellations without rebilling. The procedure involves complex calculations and data manipulations to handle billing adjustments and cancellations effectively.
The complexity of this stored procedure is high due to the following reasons:
It involves multiple steps with intricate logic and calculations.
It uses a cursor to iterate over records, which adds complexity and potential performance overhead.
It performs numerous calculations and updates across several tables.
It involves conditional logic and multiple nested operations, including function calls and complex SQL statements.
This stored procedure does not take any input parameters. It operates on data already present in the database tables, specifically targeting records in the
Initializes variables and sets default values.
Uses a cursor to iterate over records in
For each record, it calculates various billing and cancellation metrics, such as monthly percentages, billing days, and amounts.
to ensure it does not exceed the current
to update records with aggregated cancellation data.
for cancellations that have not been rebilled, ensuring no duplicates with existing records.
: The use of a cursor can lead to performance issues, especially with large datasets, as it processes rows one at a time.
: The procedure performs numerous calculations and function calls, which can be resource-intensive.
: The procedure cause full table scans, particularly in the absence of appropriate indexes, leading to slower performance.
: The procedure involves multiple updates and inserts, which leads to locking and blocking issues in a high-concurrency environment.
: Complex calculations and updates increase the risk of data integrity issues if not handled correctly.
: The use of cursors and complex logic can lead to performance bottlenecks, especially with large volumes of data.
: The procedure lacks explicit error handling, which could lead to unhandled exceptions and data inconsistencies.
: As data volume grows, the procedure may not scale well due to its complexity and reliance on cursors.
: The high complexity and lack of documentation make the procedure difficult to maintain and understand for future developers or DBAs.

-- =============================================
-- Author:		<Author,,Name>
-- Create date: <Create Date,,>
-- Description:	<Description,,>
-- =============================================
CREATE PROCEDURE [ConEd].[usp_Upload_9_ProcessSpannedCancellation]
AS 
    BEGIN
	
	/*
	Steps:
	1. put spanned data into UploadConEdisonCancellationSummary
	2. Make sure that the max BillingPeriodRevision is less than or equal to the current BillingPeriod
	3. Update record with cancellation information
	4. Insert cancellation without rebill
	*/

	/*
	1) put spanned data into UploadConEdisonCancellationSummary
	*/
        BEGIN
  
            DECLARE @UploadConEdisonCancellationTempSummarySpannedSeqid dbo.seqid
--
            DECLARE @Notes dbo.notes
            DECLARE @AccountNumber dbo.acctnum
            DECLARE @FacilityName dbo.UtilityServiceAccountName
            DECLARE @ServiceAddress dbo.addr
            DECLARE @CancelTariffCode dbo.tariff
            DECLARE @PostingDate dbo.PostingDate
--
            DECLARE @NumberOfPeriodsMinusOne dbo.Accumulator
            DECLARE @DeltaNumberOfPeriods dbo.Accumulator
            DECLARE @BillingPeriod dbo.yyyymm 
            DECLARE @FirstPeriodCanceled dbo.yyyymm 
            DECLARE @CancelThermFactor dbo.ThermsFactor 
            DECLARE @FudgedThermFactor dbo.ThermsFactor 
            DECLARE @BillingPeriodRevision dbo.yyyymm 
            DECLARE @CancelFromDate dbo.yyyymmdd 
            DECLARE @CancelToDate dbo.yyyymmdd 
            DECLARE @CalculatedBillingPeriodRevision dbo.yyyymm 
            DECLARE @CalculatedFromDate dbo.yyyymmdd 
            DECLARE @CalculatedToDate dbo.yyyymmdd 
            DECLARE @CancelBilledAmount dbo.BillingAmt 
            DECLARE @CancelBilledAmountMonthly dbo.BillingAmt 
            DECLARE @CancelBilledAmountMonthlySum dbo.BillingAmt 
            DECLARE @CancelBilledAmountAverage dbo.BillingAmt 
            DECLARE @CancelBilledAmountRemainder dbo.BillingAmt 
            DECLARE @CancelBillingPeriodDays dbo.Accumulator 
            DECLARE @CancelBillingPeriodDaysAverage dbo.Accumulator 
            DECLARE @CancelBillingPeriodDaysRemainder dbo.Accumulator 
            DECLARE @CancelTherms dbo.EnergyUnit 
            DECLARE @CancelLastPeriodTherms dbo.EnergyUnit 
            DECLARE @CancelThermsAverage dbo.EnergyUnit 
            DECLARE @CancelThermsRemainder dbo.EnergyUnit 
            DECLARE @CancelCCF dbo.EnergyUnit 
            DECLARE @CancelCCFAverage dbo.EnergyUnit 
            DECLARE @CancelCCFRemainder dbo.EnergyUnit 
            DECLARE @CancelSumAverageCCF dbo.EnergyUnit 
            DECLARE @idx INT
            DECLARE @StartingBillingPeriodDaysIncrement INT
            DECLARE @StartingBillingPeriodCCFIncrement INT
            DECLARE @StartingBillingPeriodThermsIncrement INT
            DECLARE @IncrementBillingPeriodDays INT
            DECLARE @IncrementBillingPeriodCCF INT
            DECLARE @IncrementBillingPeriodTherms INT
-- 
            DECLARE @CancelBilledAmountMonthlyLastPeriod dbo.BillingAmt
            DECLARE @CancelThermsMonthlyLastPeriod dbo.EnergyUnit 
            DECLARE @CancelCCFMonthlyLastPeriod dbo.EnergyUnit 

            DECLARE @ApplyMonthlyPercentage dbo.DiscountPercentage
            DECLARE @CancelThermsMonthlySum dbo.EnergyUnit 
            DECLARE @CancelThermsMonthly dbo.EnergyUnit 
            DECLARE @CancelCCFMonthly dbo.EnergyUnit 
            DECLARE @CancelCCFMonthlySum dbo.EnergyUnit 
            DECLARE @TotalGasSpannedBilledPercentage dbo.DiscountPercentage
            DECLARE @BillingCycle dbo.MonthlyBillingCycle
            DECLARE @ConEdUtilityCode dbo.Seqid
--
--**************************************************************************************  
--SET DEFAULTS                                                  
--**************************************************************************************
--
--SELECT @BillingPeriod = BillingPeriod FROM ApplicationTimeFrame WHERE (CurrentProcessingPeriod = 'Y')
--
--Set @BillingPeriod = '200607'
            SELECT TOP 1
                    @BillingPeriod = BillingPeriod
            FROM ConEd.UploadConEdisonCancellation
--
            SET @ConEdUtilityCode = 9
            SET @BillingCycle = 'M'
--
            DECLARE SpannedGasBillCursor CURSOR
            FOR
                SELECT  UploadConEdisonCancellationTempSummarySpannedSeqid
                FROM ConEd.UploadConEdisonCancellationTempSummarySpanned
                WHERE   ( DeltaNumberOfPeriods > 1 ) --and @BillingPeriod=@BillingPeriod
--
            OPEN SpannedGasBillCursor;
--
            FETCH NEXT FROM SpannedGasBillCursor INTO @UploadConEdisonCancellationTempSummarySpannedSeqid
--
-- Check @@FETCH_STATUS to see if there are any more rows to fetch.  UploadConEdisonCancellationTempSummarySpannedSeqid
--
            WHILE @@FETCH_STATUS = 0 
                BEGIN
	--
                    SELECT  @DeltaNumberOfPeriods = DeltaNumberOfPeriods ,
                            @BillingPeriodRevision = BillingPeriodRevision ,
                            @FirstPeriodCanceled = FirstPeriodCanceled ,
                            @CancelFromDate = CancelFromDate ,
                            @CancelToDate = CancelToDate ,
                            @CancelBilledAmount = CancelBilledAmount ,
                            @CancelCCF = CancelCCF ,
                            @CancelTherms = CancelTherms ,
                            @CancelThermFactor = CancelThermFactor ,
                            @CancelBillingPeriodDays = CancelBillingPeriodDays ,
                            @BillingPeriod = BillingPeriod ,
                            @AccountNumber = AccountNumber ,
                            @FacilityName = FacilityName ,
                            @ServiceAddress = ServiceAddress ,
                            @CancelTariffCode = CancelTariffCode ,
                            @PostingDate = PostingDate
                    FROM ConEd.UploadConEdisonCancellationTempSummarySpanned
                    WHERE   ( UploadConEdisonCancellationTempSummarySpannedSeqid = @UploadConEdisonCancellationTempSummarySpannedSeqid ) 
	--
--	SELECT  'Spanned Information',@DeltaNumberOfPeriods, @BillingPeriodRevision,@FirstPeriodCanceled,@CancelFromDate,@CancelFromDate,@BillingPeriodDays,@BilledAmount,@CCF,@Therms,@ThermFactor,@BillingPeriodDays
	--
                    SELECT  @TotalGasSpannedBilledPercentage = [dbo].[CalculateTotalGasSpannedBilledPercentage](@BillingCycle,
                                                              @DeltaNumberOfPeriods,
                                                              @FirstPeriodCanceled,
                                                              @BillingPeriodRevision)
	--select @TotalGasSpannedBilledPercentage
	
	-- Correction for zero or negative numbers
                    BEGIN
		--
                        SET @NumberOfPeriodsMinusOne = @DeltaNumberOfPeriods
                            - 1
		--
                        SET @CancelBillingPeriodDaysAverage = ( @CancelBillingPeriodDays
                                                              / @DeltaNumberOfPeriods )
                        SET @CancelBillingPeriodDaysRemainder = @CancelBillingPeriodDays
                            - ( @CancelBillingPeriodDaysAverage
                                * @DeltaNumberOfPeriods )
                        SET @StartingBillingPeriodDaysIncrement = @DeltaNumberOfPeriods
                            - @CancelBillingPeriodDaysRemainder
		--
		--	Initialize the counters for the n-1 parses
		--
                        SET @CalculatedBillingPeriodRevision = @FirstPeriodCanceled
                        SET @CalculatedFromDate = @CancelFromDate
                        SET @CalculatedToDate = @CancelToDate
                        SET @idx = 0
                        SET @CancelBilledAmountMonthlySum = 0.00
                        SET @CancelThermsMonthlySum = 0
                        SET @CancelCCFMonthlySum = 0
		--
                        WHILE ( @NumberOfPeriodsMinusOne > @idx ) 
                            BEGIN
				--
                                SELECT  @ApplyMonthlyPercentage = [dbo].[CalculateApplyMonthlyPercentageGasSpannedBilled](@CalculatedBillingPeriodRevision,
                                                              @TotalGasSpannedBilledPercentage)
				--
				-- Apply the Monthly Percentage to the CCF,Therms and Billed Amount and accumulate the weigthed average units.
				--
                                SET @CancelBilledAmountMonthly = ROUND(@CancelBilledAmount
                                                              * @ApplyMonthlyPercentage,
                                                              2)
                                SET @CancelBilledAmountMonthlySum = @CancelBilledAmountMonthlySum
                                    + @CancelBilledAmountMonthly
                                SET @CancelThermsMonthly = ROUND(@CancelTherms
                                                              * @ApplyMonthlyPercentage,
                                                              0)
                                SET @CancelThermsMonthlySum = @CancelThermsMonthlySum
                                    + @CancelThermsMonthly
                                SET @CancelCCFMonthly = ROUND(@CancelCCF
                                                              * @ApplyMonthlyPercentage,
                                                              0)
                                SET @CancelCCFMonthlySum = @CancelCCFMonthlySum
                                    + @CancelCCFMonthly
				--
				--	The Billing Period Projected "ToDate" is derived from the table "dbo.BillingPeriodProjected" using the utility company seqid and the
				--	RevisedBillingPeriod and using the "EndofPeriodTodate" as the derived "Todate" for the account.
				--
                                SELECT  @CalculatedToDate = [dbo].[DetermineConEdisonBillingPeriodProjectedToDate](@CalculatedBillingPeriodRevision,
                                                              @CancelTariffCode,
                                                              @ConEdUtilityCode)
				--
                                SELECT  @Notes = 'Therm factor '
                                        + CAST(@CancelThermFactor AS VARCHAR(6))
                                        + ' for '
                                        + CAST(@DeltaNumberOfPeriods AS VARCHAR(6))
                                        + ' First: ' + @FirstPeriodCanceled
                                        + ' ( ' + @CancelFromDate + ') Last: '
                                        + @BillingPeriodRevision + ' ( '
                                        + @CancelFromDate + '). '
                                        + ' period: '
                                        + @CalculatedBillingPeriodRevision
                                        + ' Month %: '
                                        + CAST(@ApplyMonthlyPercentage AS VARCHAR(10))
                                        + ' - Total %: '
                                        + CAST(@TotalGasSpannedBilledPercentage AS VARCHAR(10))
				--
				--  
				--
                                INSERT  INTO ConEd.UploadConEdisonCancellationSummary
                                        ( AccountUtilityCompanySeqid ,
                                          OriginalAccountNumber ,
                                          NumberOfCancelTransactions ,
                                          NumberOfTransactions ,
                                          DerivedFromSpannedBill ,
                                          BillingPeriod ,
                                          BillingPeriodRevision ,
                                          FirstCanceledBillingPeriod ,
                                          EstimatedOrActualBilling ,
                                          InitialCancelFromDate ,
                                          CurrentBillingToDate ,
                                          NumberOfBillingPeriods ,
                                          TotalBillingDaysRebilled ,
                                          TotalRebilledAmount ,
                                          TotalCanceledAmount ,
                                          PriorRevisedBilledAmount ,
                                          RevisedBilledAmount ,
                                          CanceledBilledAmount ,
                                          AverageRebillCostOfGasCharge ,
                                          AverageRebillThermsFactor ,
                                          BillingDays ,
                                          FromDate ,
                                          ToDate ,
                                          BilledAmount ,
                                          BillingAction ,
                                          ProcessedInTheCurrentPeriod ,
                                          GasRateCode ,
                                          DeliveryChargeAmount ,
                                          TotalCCF ,
                                          TotalTherms ,
                                          ThermsFactor ,
                                          CancelFromDate ,
                                          CancelToDate ,
                                          CancelDeliveryChargeAmount ,
                                          CancelTotalCCF ,
                                          CancelTotalTherms ,
                                          CancelThermsFactor ,
                                          CancelBillingDays ,
                                          Notes ,
                                          SpannedBillingPeriodRevision ,
                                          SpannedFirstCanceledBillingPeriod ,
                                          SpannedBilledAmount ,
                                          SpannedCCF ,
                                          SpannedThermFactor ,
                                          SpannedTherm ,
                                          SpannedMonthlyPercentage ,
                                          SpannedTotalPercentage ,
                                          BillingDate ,
                                          ProcessEffectiveDate ,
                                          FacilityName ,
                                          ServiceAddress
                                        )
                                        SELECT  '9' ,
                                                @AccountNumber ,  --  UploadConEdisonAccountTempSummarySPanned.AccountNumber,  
                                                1 , --  NumberOfCancelTransactions
                                                1 , --  NumberOfTransactions
                                                'Y' ,  -- DerivedFromSpannedBill = 'Y'
                                                BillingPeriod ,
                                                @CalculatedBillingPeriodRevision , -- UploadConEdisonAccountTempSummarySPanned.BillingPeriodRevision, 
                                                @CalculatedBillingPeriodRevision , -- UploadConEdisonAccountTempSummarySPanned.FirstPeriodCanceled, 
                                                'ACT' ,  -- EstimatedOrActualBilling needs to be upodated
                                                @CancelFromDate ,  -- UploadConEdisonAccountTempSummarySPanned.FromDate AS InitialCancelFromDate, 
                                                @CancelToDate , --  UploadConEdisonAccountTempSummarySPanned.ToDate AS CurrentBillingToDate,
                                                [dbo].[CalculateDeltaBillingPeriods]([dbo].[CalculateNextBillingPeriod]([dbo].DetermineConEdisonBillingPeriodProjected(@CalculatedFromDate,
                                                              @CancelTariffCode,
                                                              @ConEdUtilityCode),
                                                              @BillingCycle),
                                                              [dbo].DetermineConEdisonBillingPeriodProjected(@CalculatedToDate,
                                                              @CancelTariffCode,
                                                              @ConEdUtilityCode),
                                                              @BillingCycle) , --UploadConEdisonAccountTempSummarySPanned.DeltaNumberOfPeriods, 
                                                [dbo].[CalculateNumberOfBillingDays](@CalculatedFromDate,
                                                              @CalculatedToDate) ,-- UploadConEdisonAccountTempSummarySPanned.BillingPeriodDays AS TotalBillingDaysRebilled, 
                                                0 , --  UploadConEdisonAccountTempSummarySPanned.BilledAmount AS TotalRebilledAmount, 
                                                @CancelBilledAmountMonthly , -- IsNull(UploadConEdisonCancellationTempSummary.CancelBilledAmount,0) AS TotalCanceledAmount,
                                                0 AS PriorRevisedBilledAmount ,
                                                0 , --  IsNull(UploadConEdisonAccountTempSummarySPanned.BilledAmount, 0), 
                                                0 , -- IsNull(UploadConEdisonCancellationTempSummary.CancelBilledAmount,0), 
                                                0 AS AverageRebillCostOfGasCharge ,
                                                1.00 AS AverageRebillThermsFactor ,
                                                0 ,-- IsNull(UploadConEdisonAccountTempSummarySPanned.BillingPeriodDays,0), 
                                                NULL ,  -- UploadConEdisonAccountTempSummarySPanned.FromDate ,
                                                NULL , -- UploadConEdisonAccountTempSummarySPanned.ToDate, 
                                                @CancelBilledAmountMonthly , --  (IsNull(UploadConEdisonAccountTempSummarySPanned.BilledAmount,0) as  - IsNull(UploadConEdisonCancellationTempSummary.CancelBilledAmount,0)) as BilledAmount,
                                                CASE WHEN @BillingPeriod = @CalculatedBillingPeriodRevision
                                                     THEN 'O'
                                                     ELSE 'A'
                                                END , -- as BillingAction, 
                                                'N' AS ProcessedInTheCurrentPeriod ,
                                                @CancelTariffCode ,
                                                @CancelBilledAmountMonthly , --  IsNull(UploadConEdisonAccountTempSummarySPanned.BilledAmount,0) AS DeliveryChargeAmount, 
                                                0 , --  IsNull(UploadConEdisonAccountTempSummarySPanned.CCF,0) AS TotalCCF, 
                                                0 , --  IsNull(UploadConEdisonAccountTempSummarySPanned.Therms,0) AS TotalTherms, 
                                                1.000 , --  IsNull(UploadConEdisonAccountTempSummarySPanned.ThermFactor,1.0) AS ThermsFactor,
                                                @CalculatedFromDate , --  UploadConEdisonCancellationTempSummary.CancelFromDate, 
                                                @CalculatedToDate , --  UploadConEdisonCancellationTempSummary.CancelToDate, 
                                                @CancelBilledAmountMonthly , --  IsNull(UploadConEdisonCancellationTempSummary.CancelBilledAmount,0) AS CancelDeliveryChargeAmount, 
                                                @CancelCCFMonthly , --  IsNull(UploadConEdisonCancellationTempSummary.CancelCCF,0) AS CancelTotalCCF, 
                                                @CancelThermsMonthly , --  IsNull(UploadConEdisonCancellationTempSummary.CancelTherms,0) AS CancelTotalTherms, 
                                                CASE @CancelCCFMonthly
                                                  WHEN 0 THEN 1.0000
                                                  ELSE ROUND(@CancelThermsMonthly
                                                             * 1.0
                                                             / @CancelCCFMonthly,
                                                             4)
                                                END , --  IsNull(UploadConEdisonCancellationTempSummary.CancelThermFactor,1.0) AS CancelThermsFactor
                                                [dbo].[CalculateNumberOfBillingDays](@CalculatedFromDate,
                                                              @CalculatedToDate) , -- IsNull(UploadConEdisonAccountTempSummarySPanned.BillingPeriodDays,0), 
                                                @Notes ,
                                                @BillingPeriodRevision ,
                                                @FirstPeriodCanceled ,
                                                @CancelBilledAmount ,
                                                @CancelCCF ,
                                                @CancelThermFactor ,
                                                @CancelTherms ,
                                                @ApplyMonthlyPercentage ,
                                                @TotalGasSpannedBilledPercentage ,
                                                [dbo].ConvertDateToYYYYMMDD(@PostingDate) ,
                                                [dbo].ConvertDateToYYYYMMDD(GETDATE()) ,
                                                FacilityName ,
                                                ServiceAddress
                                        FROM ConEd.UploadConEdisonCancellationTempSummarySpanned
                                        WHERE   ( UploadConEdisonCancellationTempSummarySpannedSeqid = @UploadConEdisonCancellationTempSummarySpannedSeqid ) 

				--
                                SET @CancelSumAverageCCF = @CancelSumAverageCCF
                                    + @CancelCCFAverage 	  
                                SET @idx = @idx + 1
				--
				--	Calculate the next the Revised Billing Period row.
                                SELECT  @CalculatedBillingPeriodRevision = [dbo].[CalculateNextBillingPeriod](@CalculatedBillingPeriodRevision,
                                                              @BillingCycle)
				--	This will derive the new Revised Billing Period row's "FromDate"
                                SELECT  @CalculatedFromDate = [dbo].[DetermineConEdisonBillingPeriodProjectedFromDate](@CalculatedBillingPeriodRevision,
                                                              @CancelTariffCode,
                                                              @ConEdUtilityCode)
				--
				--	Process the next Revised Billing Period row
				--
                            END
		--
		--	Finish up the last period's processing
		--
		--	Use the (Nth -1) periods @CalculatedToDate as the "FromDate" and the acutal "ToDate" from the spanned record as the "ToDate"
		--
                        SELECT  @CalculatedFromDate = @CalculatedToDate
                        SELECT  @CalculatedToDate = @CancelToDate
		--
		--	@ApplyMonthlyPercentage is used for the notes purposes only
		--
                        SELECT  @ApplyMonthlyPercentage = [dbo].[CalculateApplyMonthlyPercentageGasSpannedBilled](@CalculatedBillingPeriodRevision,
                                                              @TotalGasSpannedBilledPercentage)
		--
		--	Derive the net changes to avoid rounding errors
		--
                        SET @CancelBilledAmountMonthlyLastPeriod = @CancelBilledAmount
                            - @CancelBilledAmountMonthlySum
                        SET @CancelThermsMonthlyLastPeriod = @CancelTherms
                            - @CancelThermsMonthlySum
                        SET @CancelCCFMonthlyLastPeriod = @CancelCCF
                            - @CancelCCFMonthlySum

                    END
	--
                    SELECT  @Notes = 'Therm factor '
                            + CAST(@CancelThermFactor AS VARCHAR(6)) + ' for '
                            + CAST(@DeltaNumberOfPeriods AS VARCHAR(6))
                            + ' First: ' + @FirstPeriodCanceled + ' ( '
                            + @CancelFromDate + ') Last: '
                            + @BillingPeriodRevision + ' ( ' + @CancelFromDate
                            + '). ' + ' period: '
                            + @CalculatedBillingPeriodRevision + ' Month %: '
                            + CAST(@ApplyMonthlyPercentage AS VARCHAR(10))
                            + ' - Total %: '
                            + CAST(@TotalGasSpannedBilledPercentage AS VARCHAR(10))
	--
                    INSERT  INTO ConEd.UploadConEdisonCancellationSummary
                            ( AccountUtilityCompanySeqid ,
                              OriginalAccountNumber ,
                              NumberOfCancelTransactions ,
                              NumberOfTransactions ,
                              DerivedFromSpannedBill ,
                              BillingPeriod ,
                              BillingPeriodRevision ,
                              FirstCanceledBillingPeriod ,
                              EstimatedOrActualBilling ,
                              InitialCancelFromDate ,
                              CurrentBillingToDate ,
                              NumberOfBillingPeriods ,
                              TotalBillingDaysRebilled ,
                              TotalRebilledAmount ,
                              TotalCanceledAmount ,
                              PriorRevisedBilledAmount ,
                              RevisedBilledAmount ,
                              CanceledBilledAmount ,
                              AverageRebillCostOfGasCharge ,
                              AverageRebillThermsFactor ,
                              BillingDays ,
                              FromDate ,
                              ToDate ,
                              BilledAmount ,
                              BillingAction ,
                              ProcessedInTheCurrentPeriod ,
                              GasRateCode ,
                              DeliveryChargeAmount ,
                              TotalCCF ,
                              TotalTherms ,
                              ThermsFactor ,
                              CancelFromDate ,
                              CancelToDate ,
                              CancelDeliveryChargeAmount ,
                              CancelTotalCCF ,
                              CancelTotalTherms ,
                              CancelThermsFactor ,
                              CancelBillingDays ,
                              Notes ,
                              SpannedBillingPeriodRevision ,
                              SpannedFirstCanceledBillingPeriod ,
                              SpannedBilledAmount ,
                              SpannedCCF ,
                              SpannedThermFactor ,
                              SpannedTherm ,
                              SpannedMonthlyPercentage ,
                              SpannedTotalPercentage ,
                              BillingDate ,
                              ProcessEffectiveDate ,
                              FacilityName ,
                              ServiceAddress
                            )
                            SELECT  '9' ,
                                    @AccountNumber ,  --  UploadConEdisonAccountTempSummarySPanned.AccountNumber,
                                    1 , --  NumberOfCancelTransactions
                                    1 , --  NumberOfTransactions
                                    'Y' ,  -- DerivedFromSpannedBill = 'Y'
                                    BillingPeriod ,
                                    @CalculatedBillingPeriodRevision , -- UploadConEdisonAccountTempSummarySPanned.BillingPeriodRevision, 
                                    @CalculatedBillingPeriodRevision , -- UploadConEdisonAccountTempSummarySPanned.FirstPeriodCanceled, 
                                    'ACT' ,  -- EstimatedOrActualBilling needs to be upodated
                                    @CancelFromDate ,  -- UploadConEdisonAccountTempSummarySPanned.FromDate AS InitialCancelFromDate, 
                                    @CancelToDate , --  UploadConEdisonAccountTempSummarySPanned.ToDate AS CurrentBillingToDate,
                                    [dbo].[CalculateDeltaBillingPeriods]([dbo].[CalculateNextBillingPeriod]([dbo].DetermineConEdisonBillingPeriodProjected(@CalculatedFromDate,
                                                              @CancelTariffCode,
                                                              @ConEdUtilityCode),
                                                              @BillingCycle),
                                                              [dbo].DetermineConEdisonBillingPeriodProjected(@CalculatedToDate,
                                                              @CancelTariffCode,
                                                              @ConEdUtilityCode),
                                                              @BillingCycle) , --UploadConEdisonAccountTempSummarySPanned.DeltaNumberOfPeriods, 
                                    [dbo].[CalculateNumberOfBillingDays](@CalculatedFromDate,
                                                              @CalculatedToDate) , -- UploadConEdisonAccountTempSummarySPanned.BillingPeriodDays AS TotalBillingDaysRebilled, 
                                    0 , --  UploadConEdisonAccountTempSummarySPanned.BilledAmount AS TotalRebilledAmount, 
                                    @CancelBilledAmountMonthlyLastPeriod , -- IsNull(UploadConEdisonCancellationTempSummary.CancelBilledAmount,0) AS TotalCanceledAmount,
                                    0 AS PriorRevisedBilledAmount ,
                                    0 , --  IsNull(UploadConEdisonAccountTempSummarySPanned.BilledAmount, 0), 
                                    0 , -- IsNull(UploadConEdisonCancellationTempSummary.CancelBilledAmount,0), 
                                    0 AS AverageRebillCostOfGasCharge ,
                                    1.00 AS AverageRebillThermsFactor ,
                                    0 , --IsNull(UploadConEdisonAccountTempSummarySPanned.BillingPeriodDays,0), 
                                    NULL ,  -- UploadConEdisonAccountTempSummarySPanned.FromDate ,
                                    NULL , -- UploadConEdisonAccountTempSummarySPanned.ToDate, 
                                    @CancelBilledAmountMonthlyLastPeriod , --  (IsNull(UploadConEdisonAccountTempSummarySPanned.BilledAmount,0) as  - IsNull(UploadConEdisonCancellationTempSummary.CancelBilledAmount,0)) as BilledAmount,
                                    CASE WHEN @BillingPeriod = @CalculatedBillingPeriodRevision
                                         THEN 'O'
                                         ELSE 'A'
                                    END , -- 'O' as BillingAction, 
                                    'N' AS ProcessedInTheCurrentPeriod ,
                                    @CancelTariffCode ,
                                    @CancelBilledAmountMonthlyLastPeriod , --  IsNull(UploadConEdisonAccountTempSummarySPanned.BilledAmount,0) AS DeliveryChargeAmount, 
                                    0 , --  IsNull(UploadConEdisonAccountTempSummarySPanned.CCF,0) AS TotalCCF, 
                                    0 , --  IsNull(UploadConEdisonAccountTempSummarySPanned.Therms,0) AS TotalTherms, 
                                    1.0 ,
                                    @CalculatedFromDate , --  UploadConEdisonCancellationTempSummary.CancelFromDate, 
                                    @CalculatedToDate , --  UploadConEdisonCancellationTempSummary.CancelToDate, 
                                    0 , --  IsNull(UploadConEdisonCancellationTempSummary.CancelBilledAmount,0) AS CancelDeliveryChargeAmount, 
                                    @CancelCCFMonthlyLastPeriod , --  IsNull(UploadConEdisonCancellationTempSummary.CancelCCF,0) AS CancelTotalCCF, 
                                    @CancelThermsMonthlyLastPeriod , --  IsNull(UploadConEdisonCancellationTempSummary.CancelTherms,0) AS CancelTotalTherms, 
                                    CASE @CancelCCFMonthlyLastPeriod
                                      WHEN 0 THEN 1.0000
                                      ELSE ROUND(@CancelThermsMonthlyLastPeriod
                                                 * 1.0
                                                 / @CancelCCFMonthlyLastPeriod,
                                                 4)
                                    END ,--  IsNull(UploadConEdisonCancellationTempSummary.CancelThermFactor,1.0) AS CancelThermsFactor
                                    [dbo].[CalculateNumberOfBillingDays](@CalculatedFromDate,
                                                              @CalculatedToDate) ,-- IsNull(UploadConEdisonAccountTempSummarySPanned.BillingPeriodDays,0), 
                                    @Notes ,
                                    @BillingPeriodRevision ,
                                    @FirstPeriodCanceled ,
                                    @CancelBilledAmount ,
                                    @CancelCCF ,
                                    @CancelThermFactor ,
                                    @CancelTherms ,
                                    @ApplyMonthlyPercentage ,
                                    @TotalGasSpannedBilledPercentage ,
                                    [dbo].ConvertDateToYYYYMMDD(@PostingDate) ,
                                    [dbo].ConvertDateToYYYYMMDD(GETDATE()) ,
                                    FacilityName ,
                                    ServiceAddress
                            FROM ConEd.UploadConEdisonCancellationTempSummarySpanned
                            WHERE   ( UploadConEdisonCancellationTempSummarySpannedSeqid = @UploadConEdisonCancellationTempSummarySpannedSeqid ) 

                    FETCH NEXT FROM SpannedGasBillCursor INTO @UploadConEdisonCancellationTempSummarySpannedSeqid
                END

            CLOSE SpannedGasBillCursor;
            DEALLOCATE SpannedGasBillCursor;


	
        END  -- 1 ends

  
  /*
  2) Make sure that the max BillingPeriodRevision is less than or equal to the current BillingPeriod
  */  
        BEGIN
  
            UPDATE  ConEd.UploadConEdisonCancellationSummary
            SET     BillingPeriodRevision = CASE WHEN BillingPeriodRevision > BillingPeriod
                                                 THEN BillingPeriod
                                                 ELSE BillingPeriodRevision
                                            END
            WHERE   ( BillingPeriod < BillingPeriodRevision )
        END -- 2 ends
  
  /*
  3) Update record with cancellation information
  */
        BEGIN
            UPDATE  UploadAdjustmentGas
            SET     UploadAdjustmentGas.[NumberOfTransactions] = UploadAdjustmentGas.[NumberOfTransactions]
                    + CancelSummary.[NumberOfTransactions] ,
                    UploadAdjustmentGas.[NumberOfCancelTransactions] = CancelSummary.[NumberOfTransactions] ,
                    UploadAdjustmentGas.[TotalCanceledAmount] = CancelSummary.[TotalCanceledAmount] ,
                    UploadAdjustmentGas.[CancelFromDate] = CancelSummary.[CancelFromDate] ,
                    UploadAdjustmentGas.[CancelToDate] = CancelSummary.[CancelToDate] ,
                    UploadAdjustmentGas.[CancelTotalCCF] = CancelSummary.[CancelTotalCCF] ,
                    UploadAdjustmentGas.[CancelTotalTherms] = CancelSummary.[CancelTotalTherms] ,
                    UploadAdjustmentGas.[CancelThermsFactor] = CancelSummary.[CancelThermsFactor] ,
                    UploadAdjustmentGas.[CancelBillingDays] = CancelSummary.[CancelBillingDays] ,
                    UploadAdjustmentGas.[Notes] = CAST(( CASE UploadAdjustmentGas.[Notes]
                                                           WHEN NULL THEN ''
                                                           ELSE 'Rebill: '
                                                              + UploadAdjustmentGas.[Notes]
                                                              + ' '
                                                         END )
                    + ( CASE CancelSummary.[Notes]
                          WHEN NULL THEN ''
                          ELSE 'Cancel: ' + CancelSummary.[Notes]
                        END ) AS VARCHAR(300))
            FROM ConEd.UploadConEdisonAccountBillingAdjustmentGas AS UploadAdjustmentGas
                    INNER JOIN ( SELECT UploadConEdisonCancellationSummary.OriginalAccountNumber ,
                                        UploadConEdisonCancellationSummary.BillingPeriodRevision ,
                                        COUNT(*) AS NumberOfTransactions ,        -- ,[NumberOfTransactions] 
                                        0 AS NumberOfRebilledTransactions , -- ,[NumberOfRebillTransactions]             
                                        COUNT(*) AS NumberOfCancelTransactions , -- ,[NumberOfCancelTransactions]
                                        SUM(TotalCanceledAmount) AS TotalCanceledAmount ,
                                        MIN(UploadConEdisonCancellationSummary.CancelFromDate) AS CancelFromDate ,     --               ,<CancelFromDate, yyyymmdd,>
                                        MAX(UploadConEdisonCancellationSummary.CancelToDate) AS CancelToDate ,     --               ,<CancelToDate, yyyymmdd,>
                                        SUM(UploadConEdisonCancellationSummary.CancelTotalCCF) AS CancelTotalCCF ,     --               ,<CancelTotalCCF, EnergyUnit,>
                                        SUM(UploadConEdisonCancellationSummary.CancelTotalTherms) CancelTotalTherms ,     --               ,<CancelTotalTherms, EnergyUnit,>
                                        MIN(UploadConEdisonCancellationSummary.CancelThermsFactor) CancelThermsFactor ,     --               ,<CancelThermsFactor, ThermsFactor,>
                                        dbo.CalculateNumberOfBillingDays(MIN(UploadConEdisonCancellationSummary.CancelFromDate),
                                                              MAX(UploadConEdisonCancellationSummary.CancelToDate)) AS CancelBillingDays ,   --               ,<CancelBillingDays, int,>
                                        MAX(UploadConEdisonCancellationSummary.Notes) AS notes
                                 FROM ConEd.UploadConEdisonCancellationSummary
                                 GROUP BY UploadConEdisonCancellationSummary.OriginalAccountNumber ,
                                        UploadConEdisonCancellationSummary.BillingPeriodRevision
                               ) AS CancelSummary ON UploadAdjustmentGas.OriginalAccountNumber = CancelSummary.OriginalAccountNumber
                                                     AND UploadAdjustmentGas.BillingPeriodRevision = cancelSummary.BillingPeriodRevision
        END -- end 3

	/*
	4) Insert cancellation without rebill
	*/
        BEGIN
            INSERT  INTO ConEd.[UploadConEdisonAccountBillingAdjustmentGas]
                    ( [AdjustedAccount] ,
                      [AccountUtilityCompanySeqid] ,
                      [NumberOfTransactions] ,
                      [NumberOfRebillTransactions] ,
                      [NumberOfCancelTransactions] ,
                      [OriginalAccountNumber] ,
                      [BillingPeriod] ,
                      [BillingPeriodRevision] ,
                      [FirstCanceledBillingPeriod] ,
                      [EstimatedOrActualBilling] ,
                      [InitialCancelFromDate] ,
                      [CurrentBillingToDate] ,
                      [NumberOfBillingPeriods] ,
                      [TotalBillingDaysRebilled] ,
                      [TotalRebilledAmount] ,
                      [TotalCanceledAmount] ,
                      [AverageRebillCostOfGasCharge] ,
                      [AverageRebillThermsFactor] ,
                      [BillingDays] ,
                      [BillingDate] ,
                      [ToDate] ,
                      [FromDate] ,
                      [BillingAction] ,
                      [ProcessedInTheCurrentPeriod] ,
                      [GasRateCode] ,
                      [TotalCCF] ,
                      [TotalTherms] ,
                      [ThermsFactor] ,
                      [CancelFromDate] ,
                      [CancelToDate] ,
                      [CancelTotalCCF] ,
                      [CancelTotalTherms] ,
                      [CancelThermsFactor] ,
                      [CancelBillingDays] ,
                      [ProcessEffectiveDate] ,
                      [DerivedFromSpannedBill] ,
                      [SpannedBillingPeriodRevision] ,
                      [SpannedFirstCanceledBillingPeriod] ,
                      [SpannedBilledAmount] ,
                      [SpannedCCF] ,
                      [SpannedThermFactor] ,
                      [SpannedTherm] ,
                      [SpannedMonthlyPercentage] ,
                      [SpannedTotalPercentage] ,
                      [Notes] ,
                      [AuthenticatedUserID] ,
                      [DateAdded] ,
                      [LastUpdate] ,
                      [FacilityName] ,
                      [ServiceAddress]

               
                    )
                    SELECT  NULL ,     --               (<AdjustedAccount, seqid,>
                            9 ,     --               ,<AccountUtilityCompanySeqid, seqid,>
                            COUNT(*) ,        -- ,[NumberOfTransactions] 
                            0 , -- ,[NumberOfRebillTransactions]                  
                            COUNT(*) , -- ,[NumberOfCancelTransactions]      
                            UploadConEdisonCancellationSummary.OriginalAccountNumber ,     --                 ,<OriginalAccountNumber, acctnum,>
                            MAX(UploadConEdisonCancellationSummary.BillingPeriod) ,      --               ,<BillingPeriod, BillingPeriod,>    
                            UploadConEdisonCancellationSummary.BillingPeriodRevision ,   --               ,<BillingPeriodRevision, BillingPeriodRevision,>
                            [dbo].[CalculateNextBillingPeriod]([dbo].DetermineConEdisonBillingPeriodProjected(MIN(UploadConEdisonCancellationSummary.CancelFromDate),
                                                              MIN(UploadConEdisonCancellationSummary.GasRateCode),
                                                              9), 'M') ,     --               ,<FirstCanceledBillingPeriod, yyyymm,>
                            [dbo].[DetermineConEdisonActualOrEstimatedBilling](UploadConEdisonCancellationSummary.OriginalAccountNumber,
                                                              UploadConEdisonCancellationSummary.BillingPeriodRevision) ,      --               ,<EstimatedOrActualBilling, varchar(3),>
                            MIN(UploadConEdisonCancellationSummary.InitialCancelFromDate) ,      --               ,<InitialCancelFromDate, yyyymmdd,>
                            MAX(UploadConEdisonCancellationSummary.CurrentBillingToDate) ,      --               ,<CurrentBillingToDate, yyyymmdd,>
                            [dbo].[CalculateDeltaBillingPeriods]([dbo].[CalculateNextBillingPeriod]([dbo].DetermineConEdisonBillingPeriodProjected(MIN(UploadConEdisonCancellationSummary.CancelFromDate),
                                                              MIN(UploadConEdisonCancellationSummary.GasRateCode),
                                                              9), 'M'),
                                                              [dbo].DetermineConEdisonBillingPeriodProjected(MAX(UploadConEdisonCancellationSummary.CancelToDate),
                                                              MAX(UploadConEdisonCancellationSummary.GasRateCode),
                                                              9), 'M') ,    --               ,<NumberOfBillingPeriods, int,>     
                            dbo.CalculateNumberOfBillingDays(MIN(UploadConEdisonCancellationSummary.FromDate),
                                                             MAX(UploadConEdisonCancellationSummary.ToDate)) ,     --                 ,<TotalBillingDaysRebilled, int,>
                            SUM(UploadConEdisonCancellationSummary.TotalRebilledAmount) ,     --                 ,<TotalRebilledAmount, money,>
                            SUM(UploadConEdisonCancellationSummary.TotalCanceledAmount) ,     --                 ,<TotalCanceledAmount, money,>
                            AVG(UploadConEdisonCancellationSummary.CostOfGasCharge) ,     --                 ,<AverageRebillCostOfGasCharge, money,>
                            AVG(UploadConEdisonCancellationSummary.ThermsFactor) ,     --               ,<AverageRebillThermsFactor, ThermsFactor,>
                            0 ,     --               ,<BillingDays, int,>
                            MAX(UploadConEdisonCancellationSummary.BillingDate) ,     --               ,<BillingDate, int,>
                            MAX(UploadConEdisonCancellationSummary.ToDate) ,     --               ,<ToDate, yyyymmdd,>
                            MIN(UploadConEdisonCancellationSummary.FromDate) ,     --               ,<FromDate, yyyymmdd,>
                            CASE WHEN MAX(UploadConEdisonCancellationSummary.BillingPeriod) = MIN(UploadConEdisonCancellationSummary.BillingPeriodRevision)
                                 THEN 'O'
                                 ELSE 'A'
                            END ,     --                ,<BillingAction, BillingAction,>
                            'N' ,     --      !!!         ,<ProcessedInTheCurrentPeriod, yesno,>
                            MAX(UploadConEdisonCancellationSummary.GasRateCode) ,  -- PAH      ,<GasRateCode, varchar(3),>
                            SUM(UploadConEdisonCancellationSummary.TotalCCF) ,     --               ,<TotalCCF, EnergyUnit,>
                            SUM(UploadConEdisonCancellationSummary.TotalTherms) ,     --               ,<TotalTherms, EnergyUnit,>
                            MIN(UploadConEdisonCancellationSummary.ThermsFactor) ,     --               ,<ThermsFactor, ThermsFactor,>
                            MIN(UploadConEdisonCancellationSummary.CancelFromDate) ,     --                 ,<CancelFromDate, yyyymmdd,>
                            MAX(UploadConEdisonCancellationSummary.CancelToDate) ,     --               ,<CancelToDate, yyyymmdd,>
                            SUM(UploadConEdisonCancellationSummary.CancelTotalCCF) ,     --                 ,<CancelTotalCCF, EnergyUnit,>
                            SUM(UploadConEdisonCancellationSummary.CancelTotalTherms) ,     --                 ,<CancelTotalTherms, EnergyUnit,>
                            MIN(UploadConEdisonCancellationSummary.CancelThermsFactor) ,     --                 ,<CancelThermsFactor, ThermsFactor,>
                            dbo.CalculateNumberOfBillingDays(MIN(UploadConEdisonCancellationSummary.CancelFromDate),
                                                             MAX(UploadConEdisonCancellationSummary.CancelToDate)) ,     --               ,<CancelBillingDays, int,>
                            [dbo].ConvertDateToYYYYMMDD(GETDATE()) ,  --               ,<ProcessEffectiveDate, varchar(8),>
                            MAX(UploadConEdisonCancellationSummary.DerivedFromSpannedBill) ,
                            MAX(UploadConEdisonCancellationSummary.SpannedBillingPeriodRevision) ,
                            MAX(UploadConEdisonCancellationSummary.SpannedFirstCanceledBillingPeriod) ,
                            CASE WHEN MAX(UploadConEdisonCancellationSummary.SpannedBilledAmount) > 0
                                 THEN MAX(UploadConEdisonCancellationSummary.SpannedBilledAmount)
                                 ELSE MIN(UploadConEdisonCancellationSummary.SpannedBilledAmount)
                            END AS SpannedBilledAmount ,
                            CASE WHEN MAX(UploadConEdisonCancellationSummary.SpannedCCF) > 0
                                 THEN MAX(UploadConEdisonCancellationSummary.SpannedCCF)
                                 ELSE MIN(UploadConEdisonCancellationSummary.SpannedCCF)
                            END AS SpannedCCF ,
                            MAX(UploadConEdisonCancellationSummary.SpannedThermFactor) ,
                            CASE WHEN MAX(UploadConEdisonCancellationSummary.SpannedTherm) > 0
                                 THEN MAX(UploadConEdisonCancellationSummary.SpannedTherm)
                                 ELSE MIN(UploadConEdisonCancellationSummary.SpannedTherm)
                            END AS SpannedTherm ,
                            MIN(UploadConEdisonCancellationSummary.SpannedMonthlyPercentage) ,
                            MIN(UploadConEdisonCancellationSummary.SpannedTotalPercentage) ,
                            MAX(UploadConEdisonCancellationSummary.Notes) ,
                            MAX(UploadConEdisonCancellationSummary.AuthenticatedUserID) ,
                            GETDATE() ,
                            GETDATE() ,
                            MIN(FacilityName) ,
                            MIN(ServiceAddress)
                    FROM ConEd.UploadConEdisonCancellationSummary
                    WHERE   UploadConEdisonCancellationSummarySeqid NOT IN (
                            SELECT  UploadConEdisonCancellationSummarySeqid
                            FROM ConEd.UploadConEdisonCancellationSummary
                                   AS cancelSum
                                    INNER JOIN ConEd.[UploadConEdisonAccountBillingAdjustmentGas]
                                   AS adj ON cancelSum.BillingPeriodRevision = adj.BillingPeriodRevision
                                              AND cancelSum.OriginalAccountNumber = adj.OriginalAccountNumber )
                    GROUP BY UploadConEdisonCancellationSummary.OriginalAccountNumber ,
                            UploadConEdisonCancellationSummary.BillingPeriodRevision    
  
        END -- 4 ends  

    END
